00055     AreaEffect::AreaEffect(const String &name, Vector3 Location, World *world)
00056         : Name (name)
00057     {
00058         TheWorld = world;
00059         CreateGhostObject(Location);
00060     }

00062     AreaEffect::~AreaEffect()
00063     {
00064         delete Ghost;
00065         delete Shape;
00066     }
00067 
00068     void AreaEffect::CreateGhostObject(Vector3 Location)
00069     {
00070         Ghost = new btPairCachingGhostObject();
00071         Ghost->setCollisionFlags(Ghost->getCollisionFlags() + btCollisionObject::CF_NO_CONTACT_RESPONSE);
00072         Ghost->getWorldTransform().setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00073         Ghost->setUserPointer(this);
00074     }
00075 
00076     void AreaEffect::AddActorToList(ActorBase* Actor)
00077     {
00078         AddedActors.push_back(Actor);
00079         OverlappingActors.push_back(Actor);
00080     }
00081 
00082     void AreaEffect::RemoveActorFromList(ActorBase* Actor)
00083     {
00084         RemovedActors.push_back(Actor);
00085         for( std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator c=OverlappingActors.begin(); c!=OverlappingActors.end(); c++)
00086         {
00087             if ( Actor == (*c) )
00088             {
00089                 OverlappingActors.erase(c);
00090             }
00091         }
00092     }
00093 
00094     void AreaEffect::UpdateActorList()
00095     {
00096         if ( !(AddedActors.empty()) )
00097             AddedActors.clear();
00098         if ( !(RemovedActors.empty()) )
00099             RemovedActors.clear();
00100         btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* PhysWorld = TheWorld->GetPhysicsManager()->GetPhysicsWorldPointer();
00101         PhysWorld->getDispatcher()->dispatchAllCollisionPairs(Ghost->getOverlappingPairCache(), PhysWorld->getDispatchInfo(), PhysWorld->getDispatcher());
00102 
00103         int OverlappingPairs = Ghost->getOverlappingPairCache()->getNumOverlappingPairs();
00104         btBroadphasePair* Pair = Ghost->getOverlappingPairCache()->getOverlappingPairArrayPtr();
00105         std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator it = OverlappingActors.begin();
00106         // Make a bool vector to keep track of which actors to keep when updating.
00107         std::vector<bool> Tracker;
00108         Tracker.resize(OverlappingActors.size());
00109         std::vector<bool>::iterator bit;
00110         for ( bit = Tracker.begin() ; bit != Tracker.end() ; bit++ )
00111         {
00112             (*bit) = false;
00113         }
00114         // Add objects to the necessary lists as needed.  Also track what needs to be removed for later.
00115         for ( int x=0 ; x<OverlappingPairs ; x++ )
00116         {
00117             // Get the non-ghost object from a given pair and cast it to a usable pointer.
00118             btCollisionObject* ColObj = Pair[x].m_pProxy0->m_clientObject != Ghost ? (btCollisionObject*)(Pair[x].m_pProxy0->m_clientObject) : (btCollisionObject*)(Pair[x].m_pProxy1->m_clientObject);
00119             ActorBase* Actor = (ActorBase*)(ColObj->getUserPointer());
00120             // Check list for the actor in the pair.
00121             for( it = OverlappingActors.begin(), bit = Tracker.begin() ; it != OverlappingActors.end() ; it++, bit++ )
00122             {
00123                 if ( Actor == (*it) )
00124                 {
00125                     (*bit) = true;
00126                     break;
00127                 }
00128             }
00129             if ( it == OverlappingActors.end() )
00130             {
00131                 AddActorToList(Actor);
00132                 Tracker.push_back(true);
00133             }
00134         }
00135         // Verify they are the same size.  Then remove items from the list as necessary.
00136         if ( OverlappingActors.size() == Tracker.size() )
00137         {
00138             std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator sit = OverlappingActors.begin();
00139             for ( bit = Tracker.begin() ; bit != Tracker.end() ; )
00140             {
00141                 if ( (*bit) == false )
00142                 {
00143                     bit = Tracker.erase(bit);
00144                     ActorBase* Act = (*sit);
00145                     RemovedActors.push_back(Act);
00146                     sit = OverlappingActors.erase(sit);
00147                 }else{
00148                     sit++;
00149                     bit++;
00150                 }
00151             }
00152         }
00153     }

00155     void AreaEffect::CreateSphereShape(Real Radius)
00156     {
00157         Shape = new btSphereShape(Radius);
00158         Ghost->setCollisionShape(Shape);
00159     }

00173     void AreaEffect::CreateShapeFromMesh(String Filename, String Group)
00174     {
00175         Ogre::Entity* entity = Ogre::Root::getSingleton()._getCurrentSceneManager()->createEntity("AETest1", Filename, Group);
00176         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00177         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00178         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00179         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00180 
00181         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00182         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00183         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00184 
00185         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00186         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00187         unsigned int* indices = new unsigned int[indexData->indexCount];
00188         unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00189         float* pReal = NULL;
00190         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; j++, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00191         {
00192             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00193             vertices[j].x = *pReal++;
00194             vertices[j].y = *pReal++;
00195             vertices[j].z = *pReal++;
00196         }
00197         vBuffer->unlock();
00198         size_t index_offset = 0;
00199         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00200 
00201         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00202         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00203 
00204         if (use32bitindexes)
00205         {
00206             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00207             {
00208                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00209             }
00210         }
00211         else
00212         {
00213             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00214             {
00215                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00216             }
00217         }
00218         iBuffer->unlock();
00219 
00220         btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00221         btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00222         int i=0;
00223         for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00224         {
00225             vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00226             vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00227             vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00228             trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00229             i+=3;
00230         }
00231         delete[] vertices;
00232         delete[] indices;
00233         Ogre::Root::getSingleton()._getCurrentSceneManager()->destroyEntity(entity);
00234 
00235         Shape = new btGImpactMeshShape(trimesh);
00236         Ghost->setCollisionShape(Shape);
00237     }

00239     void AreaEffect::ScaleFieldShape(Vector3 Scale)
00240     {
00241         Ghost->getCollisionShape()->setLocalScaling(Scale.GetBulletVector3());

00248     }

00292     void TestAE::ApplyEffect()
00293     {
00294         std::vector<ActorBase*>* Added = &(GetAddedActors());
00295         std::vector<ActorBase*>* Removed = &(GetRemovedActors());
00296         std::list<ActorBase*>* Current = &(GetOverlappingActors());
00297 
00298         std::vector<ActorBase*>::iterator AaRIt;
00299         std::list<ActorBase*>::iterator CurrIt;
00300 
00301         ActorBase* Act = NULL;
00302 
00303         if ( !(Added->empty()) )
00304         {
00305             TheWorld->Log("Actors Added to field this frame:");
00306             for ( AaRIt = Added->begin() ; AaRIt != Added->end() ; AaRIt++ )
00307             {
00308                 Act = (*AaRIt);
00309                 TheWorld->Log(Act);
00310             }
00311         }
00312         if ( !(Removed->empty()) )
00313         {
00314             TheWorld->Log("Actors Removed from field this frame:");
00315             for ( AaRIt = Removed->begin() ; AaRIt != Removed->end() ; AaRIt++ )
00316             {
00317                 Act = (*AaRIt);
00318                 TheWorld->Log(Act);
00319             }
00320         }
00321         if ( !(Current->empty()) )
00322         {
00323             TheWorld->Log("Actors Currently in field this frame:");
00324             for ( CurrIt = Current->begin() ; CurrIt != Current->end() ; CurrIt++ )
00325             {
00326                 Act = (*CurrIt);
00327                 TheWorld->Log(Act);
00328             }
00329         }
00330     }

00343     void GravityField::ApplyEffect()
00344     {
00345         std::vector<ActorBase*>* Added = &(GetAddedActors());
00346         std::vector<ActorBase*>* Removed = &(GetRemovedActors());
00347         std::vector<ActorBase*>::iterator It;
00348         PhysicsManager* Physics = TheWorld->GetPhysicsManager();
00349         ActorBase* Act = NULL;
00350 
00351         if ( !(Added->empty()) )
00352         {
00353             for ( It = Added->begin() ; It != Added->end() ; It++ )
00354             {
00355                 Act = (*It);
00356                 Physics->SetIndividualGravity(Act, Grav);
00357             }
00358         }
00359         if ( !(Removed->empty()) )
00360         {
00361             for ( It = Removed->begin() ; It != Removed->end() ; It++ )
00362             {
00363                 Act = (*It);
00364                 Physics->SetIndividualGravity(Act, Physics->GetGravity());
00365             }
00366         }
00367     }
00368 
00369     void GravityField::SetFieldGravity(Vector3 Gravity)
00370     {
00371         Grav = Gravity;
00372     }
00373 
00374     Vector3 GravityField::GetFieldGravity()
00375     {
00376         return Grav;
00377     }
